vote.title: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32861, previously approved on September 18, 2024, authorizing (1) certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2024-25 for the maintenance and operation of various departments, and activities; and (2) the City Manager to implement those adjustments - Not to exceed $3,859,143,950 - Financing:  General Fund ($1,903,410,750), Enterprise Funds, Internal Service, and Other Funds ($1,766,760,252), and Grants, Trust, and Other Funds ($188,972,948)
